'''Sand Characters''' is a technique that utilises [[sand]] as a method of communication.

== Usage ==
* Sajin used this technique during the written test of the joint [[Chūnin Exams]], where he altered the terrain by using sand to leave a message to [[Mujin|his]] [[Mijin|teammates]].
* During the events of ''[[Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Will of Fire]]'', Gaara gave [[Jiraiya]] a bag of sand, which, when scattered, took the shape of a sign that signalled a temporary cease of fire for [[Sunagakure]] troops.
